title: Atlas
description: A project named Atlas that demonstrates a sleek UI and dynamic data interactions. Built using modern JavaScript principles for performance and maintainability.

title: Tiktaktoe
description: A simple and fun Tic Tac Toe game made with JavaScript. Allows two players to take turns and highlights the winning combination.

title: Currency Converter
description: Convert currencies in real-time using exchange rates from a public API. Clean UI with responsive design and accurate data updates.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase skills, experience, and projects. Built using React and styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern look.

title: Firebase Contact App
description: Manage contacts with a user-friendly interface built in React. Connects to Firebase for adding, editing, and deleting contacts in real-time.

title: Udacity Landing Page
description: A clean and responsive landing page designed as part of the Udacity program. Built with semantic HTML, styled with CSS, and made interactive with JavaScript.

title: Spotify Clone
description: A front-end UI clone of Spotify's homepage using only HTML and CSS. Focused on layout, responsiveness, and pixel-perfect design replication.
